title: Wisegirls: DVD-R, DVD5, ISO, NTSC
description:
Everything intact except Region and Encryption 
DVD-R, DVD5, ISO, NTSC 
Pretty good movie though not alot of people have even heard of it. 
If you like mob movies or crime movies you\&#039;ll like this. 

Actors: Mira Sorvino, Mariah Carey, Melora Walters, Arthur J. Nascarella, Saul Stein 
Directors: David Anspaugh 
Format: Closed-captioned, Color, DVD-Video, Subtitled, Widescreen, NTSC 
Language: English 
Subtitles: English, Spanish 
Region: Region Free 
Aspect Ratio: 1.33:1 
Number of discs: 1 
Rating: R 
Studio: Lions Gate 
DVD Release Date: December 31, 2002 
Run Time: 96 minutes 

At Santolino\&#039;s Restaurant, there\&#039;s something even scarier than undercooked Scampi on the menu... murder! Maria Carey, Mira Sorvino and Melora Walters give strong performances as three waitresses who forge an unbreakable friendship when they find themselves involved in organized crime. Meg (Acadamy Award winner Mira Sorivno) is escaping a tragic past. When she takes a job at the \"family-run\" Italian restaurant, she finds comraderie with tough Raychel (music superstar Mariah Carey) and Kate (Melora Walters), who harbors an explosive secret. Through back room deals, the women discover that survival is going to depend on much more than just service with a smile
